desc: An obsidian shard that contains the spirit of Mannag. Resonates wtih Kielazar's soul.
lore: An obsidian shard containing the spirit of Mannag, Kielazar's loyal wolfhound companion. The polished surface radiates with spectral energy, and those especially attuned to the supernatural may be able to hear a faint howling within. Mannag never fails to answer his master's call. In a way, both master and hound have become one in spirit.
name: Mannag's Howl
